question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "On the reactor side, the Jiangmen Underground Neutrino Observatory JUNO is a nextgeneration oscillation experiments aiming at the determination of neutrino mass ordering and measuring oscillation parameters with subpercent precision"?
reference_entry: JUNO, A. Abusleme et al., Sub-percent precision measurement of neutrino oscillation

question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "The density structure along each baseline is inferred from these mapped geological units together with the petrophysical properties of the corresponding strata and rock types"?
reference_entry: J. Deng, H. Chen, et al., Rock Physical Properties Characteristics of Typical Uranium Deposits
